|blank1_info =BO-C |blank2_name =Postal abbrv. |blank2_info = |blank3_name = |blank3_info = |website = http://www.cochabamba.gob.bo/ |footnotes = }} Cochabamba is a department in Bolivia. The capital city is Cochabamba. ==Provinces== The Department of Cochabamba is divided into 16 provinces which are further divided into 47 municipalities.www.bolivia.com (English) Then on the fourth level into 144 cantons.
